title: California privacy regulator’s first case: probing connected cars
description: Data collection in cars has surged in recent years, especially in cars that encourage users to plug in their phones to play music, get spoken directions and make hands-free calls.

title: ‘SHUT IT OFF!!' Disruptive new 'X’ logo removed in San Francisco
description: Twitter HQ's X sign is being taken down in San Francisco after complaints

title: Online book clubs are exploding. Let’s find the right one for you.
description: From Goodreads to TikTok, online communities of readers make joining a book club — on the internet or in person — easier than ever.
